title: How many Grammys did Songs in the Key of Life win? - Quora

response.answer_text: Motown legend Stevie Wonder 1976 epic performance won Album of the Year but the artist won Best Male Pop Vocal Performance, Best Male R&B Vocal Performance and Producer of the Year at the 1977 Grammys. The album which reached Diamond status for 10 million sales was inducted in The Grammy Hall of Fame in 2002 as well as number 89 in Top 1000 Albums of All-Time and #57 on Rolling Stone's list of The 500 Greatest Albums of All Time.
